column4: a solution for upgrading from 9/04 to 9.10 when the your stuck at the login window you type ypur correct password and it keeps returning to the login window this worked for me.. reinstall 9.04 when you get to the login window type in your password then click the automatic login button complete the install then upgrade to 9.10 again you get to the log in window it will hang for a while then bingo 9.10 will complete installation..it worked for me  oh you can
allways go back to a password login later after the upgrade
hope this helps others with the same problem i had
Hi. Did you get help with your problems yesterday. I was just about to reply when you logged off
